name: I Need Adrenaline
description:
Everything is the same, nothing changes!

The days are always boring and boring, nothing to do...

I need to do something different, I need to do something new, I need to do something that cheers me up...

I NEED ADRENALINE!

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

I Need Adrenaline is a frenetic police chase game. Become the biggest thug in the world by stealing several bags of money scattered around the map while you are chased by the police!

Get ready for the real adrenaline by taking on police cars, helicopters and narrow roads.

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bart GameDev - YouTube

----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Bugs, typos or any other problem with the game, let me know!

Some textures and sound effects were not created by me, the original creators are in the credits of the game, all credit is given to them, not to me. If you see your work here and it doesn't have any credits, please contact me immediately.
